content:
SoMa has plenty of excellent coffee shops to choose from. I'd be happy to recommend some popular spots within a 20-minute walk from the neighborhood. Here are a few:

1. **Four Barrel Coffee** (15-minute walk): A San Francisco staple with a location on 4th Street and Brannan. They source high-quality beans and have a wide variety of pour-overs and espresso drinks.
2. **Blue Bottle Coffee** (12-minute walk): Another popular coffee chain with a location on New Montgomery Street. They're known for their minimalist atmosphere and expertly crafted pour-overs.
3. **Sightglass Coffee** (18-minute walk): With a location on 7th Street and Folsom, Sightglass is a local favorite that offers a variety of blends and single-origin pour-overs. Their cafe is also a great spot to grab a pastry or breakfast sandwich.
4. **Ritual Coffee Roasters** (15-minute walk): On the corner of 4th Street and Howard, Ritual is a San Francisco-based coffee roaster with a cafe serving up delicious pour-overs, espresso drinks, and tasty pastries.
5. **La Colombe Coffee** (12-minute walk): This Philadelphia-based coffee roaster has a location on 2nd Street and Folsom. They offer a variety of blends and single-origin pour-overs, as well as a selection of teas and pastries.
6. **Verve Coffee Roasters** (18-minute walk): With a location on 10th Street and Market, Verve is a popular spot for coffee connoisseurs. They source high-quality beans and offer a variety of pour-overs, espresso drinks, and delicious pastries.

All of these spots are within a 20-minute walk from SoMa, so you can't go wrong with any of them! Enjoy your morning coffee and have a great day at work!
